subject: Switch from Supabase to Firebase Auth (RS256 requirement)
body:
Fireblocks NCW OAuth requires RS256 JWT signing, but Supabase uses ES256
which is fundamentally incompatible. Updated all documentation to reflect
Firebase Auth as the chosen provider.

- Update CLAUDE.md with Firebase config and OAuth settings
- Add AI_MISTAKES.md to document the Supabase/Fireblocks incompatibility
- Update USER_ACTIONS.md with Firebase migration checklist
- Update SESSION_NOTES.md with current status
- Add debugging logs and fix initialization order in App.tsx and stores

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
